title: Find the 'Stern Librarian' Ffion
content:
body beneath the bed, adjacent to the blood stains. Extract the body to reveal Ffion's remains, obtaining Ffion's key in the process. Following the search, engage with Ffion's corpse using the Speak with the Dead spell. Pose the following questions:

Who are you? What is this location? How did your demise occur? What were your activities before your passing? Leave.
